name: Garret
text: Man, you got some really big hands don't ya?

name: Garret
text: I mean, I'm not saying that's a bad thing, but it's just... you know... noticeable.

name: Garret
text: Hey, don't you think it's weird how this place is empty?

choices.text: I don't know, I think it's kind of nice.

name: Garret
text: I mean, it's like, we're the only ones here. It's like a ghost town or something.

name: Garret
text: That's the life, huh? Just two of us, and no one else.
